titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require the prorating of Medicaid beneficiary contributions in the case of partial coverage of nursing facility services during a month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 9/14/1999--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require the prorating of Medicaid beneficiary contributions in the case of partial coverage of nursing facility services during a month.
